0x8 TallinnSec meetup - AV evasion/shellcoding/cloud services

30th March, 10.30 @Tallinn Art Space T1 mall

Posted on March 18, 2019

We are happy to announce that our this time meetup will be taking place at the Tallinn Art Space in the T1 mall (1 floor). The place was provided for us as part of the sponsorship for which we are very thankful! So we can fit all of you!

Sign up to the event: https://www.meetup.com/TallinnSec/events/259557070/
Place: Tallinn Art Space, T1 mall, 1st floor
Time: 10.30

Agenda:

  • 10.30 - Gathering
  • 10.45 - Introductions to Tallinn Art Space by Jaak Visnap
  • 11.00 - "Intro to AV Evasion" by Sebastian Feldmann (GoSecure https://www.gosecure.net, Canada)
  • 11.30 - "Intro to shellcoding" by Silvia Väli (Clarified Security https://clarifiedsecurity.com, Estonia)
  • Leveraging cloud services for managing secrets by Vlad Nikiforov from Glia (https://www.glia.com)
Intro to shellcoding mini-workshop will be given on Ubuntu 16.04 64-bit VM, so if you wanna try along, you should be running something similar in your Virtualbox https://www.osboxes.org/ubuntu/.

Sponsors:

Find Us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TallinnSec
Find Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tallinnsec/

Stay tuned for our next meetups on our website as well as on TallinnSec meetup page.
